entities.name: burke
entities.description: Burke bought the locket from a ragged-looking woman. He paid her a pittance for it.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's eyes flashed scarlet at Harry's words, indicating his strong reaction to the locket.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry saw Voldemort's knuckles whiten on the locket's chain and thought Voldemort was not going to let go of it.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: The ragged-looking woman sold the locket to Burke, but had no idea of its true value.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is Voldemort's nickname, as referred to by the speaker.

entities.name: the locket
entities.description: The locket is a valuable object with various powers attributed to it. It was bought by Burke and later taken back by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Burke bought the locket from a ragged-looking woman, who had no idea of its true value.
Voldemort owned the locket and was reluctant to let it go.
Harry observed Voldemort's reaction to the locket, noticing his knuckles whiten on its chain.
